alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 6:28PM CDT until August 11 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR CLARK COUNTY... At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Thorp, or 22 miles northwest of Neillsville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Greenwood around 645 PM CDT. Loyal around 655 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ballard Road And Pray Avenue, Highway 73 And 98, Atwood, Tioga, Christie, Lynn and Eidsvold. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
